prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan when she traveled to Munich, from Michigan, with her then husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's older cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan when she traveled to Munich, from Michigan, with her then husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's older cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's true thoughts, feelings, and reactions when I stepped off the S-Bahn the morning of September 20th, 2024?

Stefan should be represented by the 3rd house (cousin in-law) and Me by the Ascendant.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a listing of the pertinent horary data gathered from the chart, following traditional horary principles and taking into account that Melissa is represented by the Ascendant and Stefan by the 3rd house. Note that the rule for the 3rd house is that its cusp is in Scorpio, making Mars the traditional significator for Stefan:

1. House and Cusp Details
 • Ascendant (Self/Melissa): 10° Virgo
 • 3rd House (Stefan’s representation): Begins at 1° Scorpio

2. Key Planetary Positions and Rulerships
 • Mars (ruler of Scorpio for Stefan) is located in the 11th House in Cancer.
 • Mercury (ruler of Virgo for Melissa) is in Aquarius in the 6th House.
 • The Sun, Mercury, and Pluto occupy the 5th House (14° Capricorn cusp).
 • Moon, Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node occupy the 7th House (beginning at 10° Pisces).
 • Chiron is in the 8th House (3° Aries).
 • Uranus is in the 9th House (1° Taurus).
 • Jupiter is in the 10th House (6° Gemini).

3. Major Aspects Involving Key Planets
 • Mars (Stefan’s significator) forms:
  – A square with Chiron (orb ~1°), which may indicate painful or conflicted reactions.
  – A sextile with Uranus (orb ~3°), suggesting sudden or unexpected influences.
  – A trine with Saturn (orb ~3°), implying structure or restraint in his response.
  – A trine with Neptune (orb ~7°) and is also in aspect via Venus trine Mars (orb ~7°), which can suggest an overlay of idealism or confusion.
 • Mercury (Melissa’s significator) forms:
  – A conjunction with Pluto in the 5th House (orb ~4°), linking the inquiry to intense personal transformation.
  – A sextile with the IC (orb 0°) and a trine with the MC (orb 0°), connecting the chart’s foundational and public points.
  – A trine with Jupiter (orb ~5°), suggesting broader, optimistic context.
 • The Moon, in Pisces in the 7th House, has:
  – A conjunction with Saturn (orb ~2°) and
  – An opposition to the Ascendant (orb ~5°), highlighting interpersonal tension.
  – A square with Jupiter (orb ~4°) contributing to dynamic emotional interplay.

4. Chart Patterns and Structures
 • A T-square involving:
  – MC at 6° Gemini, Ascendant at 10° Virgo, IC at 6° Sagittarius, with Jupiter at 11° Gemini.
 • A second T-square involving:
  – Ascendant at 10° Virgo, Jupiter at 11° Gemini, Saturn at 17° Pisces, and Moon at 15° Pisces.
 • The overall structure is noted as a Bowl shape with a dominant Air element among the inner planets and a Mutable mode dominance.

5. Additional Notable Features
 • The moon phase at the time was a waxing crescent.
 • Most aspects (trines and sextiles) occur within a total of nine, providing a generally flowing energy backdrop.
 • Neptune in Pisces (placed in the 7th) is the sole dispositor, underscoring the influence of Piscean dynamics in interpersonal matters.

This is the data set as extracted from the horary chart using traditional horary methods, focusing on the significators for Melissa (Ascendant/Mercury) and Stefan (3rd house/Mars) along with key structural and aspectual details.

This is the data set as extracted from the horary chart using traditional horary methods, focusing on the significators for Melissa (Ascendant/Mercury) and Stefan (3rd house/Mars) along with key structural and aspectual details.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on your horary chart, Stefan’s reaction appears layered and conflicted. As represented by Mars in Cancer from his 3rd house, his initial impact was one of abrupt, unexpected disturbance. The sextile with Uranus indicates that Melissa’s entrance sparked an unforeseen jolt—an electric surprise that unsettled his usual routine. This sudden revelation, however, met resistance as evidenced by Mars’s square to Chiron; here, past wounds and sensitivity emerged, suggesting a painful reminder that left him feeling exposed and raw. The calming influence of Mars trine Saturn, meanwhile, points to a deliberate effort on his part to rein in his immediate impulses, invoking self-discipline to contain feelings he might have found overwhelming.

Concurrently, the presence of the Moon in Pisces within the 7th house—linked to the relational sphere and further compounded by its conjunction with Saturn and opposition to your Ascendant—reinforces that Stefan’s underlying emotional state was steeped in confusion and melancholy. He was likely internally conflicted, caught between a magnetic attraction sparked by the unexpected encounter and lingering hesitations rooted in earlier hurt.

In sum, Stefan’s true thoughts and feelings at that moment combined an electric surprise with an acute recollection of past pain, prompting him to mask or moderate his inner tumult with controlled restraint.
